sentences.sContent: Meat from the infected animals is regarded as a serious health risk (= something likely to harm people’s health ) .
sentences.sCn: 受感染动物的肉被认为对健康有严重威胁。

sentences.sContent: ...and that the former is a key risk factor for conditions such as heart disease...

...You have a higher risk if you have red or blond hair...
...It is sunburn that is most worrying recent research shows five episodes of sunburn in the teenage years increases the risk of all skin cancers...

...fewer unhappy couples will risk starting separate households...
